website_summaries.verdict: A solid all-terrain kart for younger kids.
pros: Works equally well on asphalt and grass
We love that its short charging time means it can be driven often, and it holds a charge for hours
Forty-minute battery, max speed of nine miles per hour, eight-inch rubber tires

customer_reviews.title: Fun when it works, but it often doesn't.
customer_reviews.text: It's been broken or finicky most of the time we have had it. Customer service people are friendly but it takes a while to work through their script to actually get to your problem. When they do get to a possible solution you just have to wait until the part arrives then hope that fixes it. If that doesn't, then you have to start over again and then wait on the next part. I've been through this process several times in 6 months of ownership. Too much hassle for the money. UPDATE: The Buggy has now spent more time in my garage broken than it has in working order.
customer_reviews.author: barry wilson

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: This dune buggy is awesome!! We opened the box, my husband pulled it out and my son was able to immediately start riding. No assembly required!! Great birthday present and plenty of riding time.
customer_reviews.author: Coffie

customer_reviews.title: Buggy
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this! Pretty tough vehicle, and came ready to go out of the box. My little one has run in to bushes, trees, and poles and this buggy has held up very well, only thing that broke was the flag pole that came with buggy. I don't them use it during heavy dew or standing water just in case. Battery charges after drained 4-6 hours and my boys get usually 60-70 min of continuous use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. I was skeptical, but it turns out I love it
customer_reviews.text: My husband was not convinced about this thing since it's rechargeable. Turns out this is awesome for our 7 year old. It's very heavy and stable. It goes just fast enough. The battery life is far beyond what I had hoped for. I was worried above t this tipping or flipping but it's so low to the ground that won't happen. This was the perfect cart for kids who have outgrown their power wheels keeps but aren't ready for a full-blown go cart yet. My one concern is that it's somewhat small, so my son will outgrow it before he is "ready" to move on to a bigger real go cart.
customer_reviews.author: tammywithkids

customer_reviews.title: I would like to see the back bar higher over the head ...
customer_reviews.text: Battery did not last very long. I purchased different brand battery. Cart is well built. Moves along our 1 acre of dirt with no problems. Kids have blast on it. It is low to ground which helps it from tipping over. It hasnt tipped yet and hope it doesnt. I make sure kides wear helmet and buckle in. I would like to see the back bar higher over the head and a 3 point seat belt or harness type belt in the event it did tip. It is a fun cart. Keep it maintained, lube the chain and gears under the rear plastic box.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Must read
customer_reviews.text: I bought this buggy for my son a day before his birthday I’d like to say it’s a great item but i wouldn’t know now n so wouldn’t he . When the package arrived it was tempered and the charger was missing as well as the buggy had signs of being previously used all though i purchased it as brand new . Not happy with this specific order they could have packaged it better and more secure and double check all products where in the box . Thank you for letting my 8 year old down on his birthday you guys “Rock “
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: 100 times bettter than a power-wheel for the same price - built tough
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves it. The seat belt clip broke a few weeks after owning it and I contacted Razor and the people didn't even question it; sent me a brand new seat belt unit and installed very easily. It is slower then it looks, but I think for a small child is fast enough. There are enough tutorials that show you how to upgrade the unit to make it go faster. If you are interested in a power wheel style Kart look no further. If you want to get a fast go-kart style gas powered Kart, then this may not be fast enough. Overall I was VERY pleased with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: California Phantom

customer_reviews.title: It seems like it would be too small for her but it ...
customer_reviews.text: My 11 yr old loves! She's tall for her age. It seems like it would be too small for her but it isn't. The way it's designed you can still comfortably drive even with long legs and the power and battery life is great. We have to order another one for our 7 yr old now!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Blevins

customer_reviews.title: They will not stand behind their products.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kid for Christmas. It worked fine for the first 2-3 months. In month 4 (just outside of the 90 day warranty), the charger stopped working. I called and they wanted me to spend another $30 for a charger. When you spend $270 on a item like this it should not stop working in 4 months and we should not have to replace a charger due to normal use.
customer_reviews.author: LordLawFirm

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this dune buggy. My 8-year old son is absolutely crazy about it - he rides it every chance he gets. The battery life is just about an hour of use. It's easy enough to transport in my Honda CRV to bring places with us. Everywhere we go, people ask us about it. It's a huge step up from Power Wheels (which also served its purpose when my son was younger). But this thing - HUGE THUMBS UP!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Galante

customer_reviews.title: Son is thrilled with it
customer_reviews.text: Great Delivery. Came Peomotly. Dune Buggy performs well and is designed pretty good. The wheels could use to be a little bigger and beefier to handle the power, speed, and bumps of off road riding a little better. But my son loves it I just hope the wheels hold up. It charges pretty quickly compared to other battery operated vehicles . I can get him on in the morning for about an hour or so, and back on in the afternoon, around 4 to 5 hours later. Works for me.
customer_reviews.author: sprague smith

customer_reviews.title: Razor exceeds expectations!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have been riding this non-stop since Christmas eve. It is a beast and can handle all 3 of them at once. See the video of my 10 year old pulling my 6 and 3 year old on the sled. It goes the perfect speed, can handle some pretty rough and icy terrain. Charges quickly and battery lasts forever. Don't hesitate to buy. If ours dies, I'll replace it for sure!
customer_reviews.author: B Rylie

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for about 40 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Our kids have had a blast in this buggy since we got it. I've been surprised with how long the buggy will run on the battery, usually longer than 40 minutes of play time. We think that we may buy a bigger battery for it down the road, but so far the battery outlasts our kids interest in riding it. There are some people online who have modified it to go faster which would probably be a lot of fun for the kids. The only thing to think about is that the flag that it comes with is nearly invisible so I recommend getting a high-visibility replacement.
customer_reviews.author: IJC

customer_reviews.title: Her Favorite Christmas Gift by Far!
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old LOVES it! Battery seems to last longer than an hour. She has never driven it long enough for the battery to die. Built solid and goes pretty fast (much faster than a plastic car). Only down side is there isn't reverse, so anytime she gets in a jam we have to turn it around. No biggy. Have taken this up hills, on gravel, and on dirt trails. All no problem. Assume tires will need to be replaced within a couple months or so.
customer_reviews.author: Troy &.

customer_reviews.title: Greatest gift our three year old has gotten!
customer_reviews.text: We were very hesitant to give this to our three year old given the suggested age of use... but, he has done very well in the past with 12V "toys", so we decided to give it a try. We intended to immediately adjust the throttle to not go full speed. We started him going really slow with the throttle unadjusted in an open field... he hammered down and did great. Six months later and he drives this thing great! He has never had a problem or ran in to anything since his third birthday... and that is with a big full helmet on!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product. Not too fast or too slow
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy product. Not too fast or too slow, but just right for our eight year old. But, the charger stopped working after less than 10 uses, which has left me less than enthusiastic about this purchase. Will look into getting a replacement charger but kind of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: C. del Castillo-Hegyi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome family fun
customer_reviews.text: My 3yr and 4yr old love this cart. They drive it everywhere under my close supervision. You have to know your kids and their abilities to drive it. After a quick lesson it was off to the races! With them riding on it they zip around quite quick. My wife has also had a turn on it since she is under the weight limit. But it could haul more :)
customer_reviews.author: BoozyPickles

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toy!!
customer_reviews.text: This required no assembly and was easy to charge. My 5yo can ride it on pavement for about an hour until it starts slowing down. Takes about 4 hours to recharge. I bought him a real helmet and he was all set. The hand throttle is a little odd but he figured it out quickly. I only paid $350 for it and if we get a year or two out of it, I will be satisfied. FYI, it rides well in the back yard too!
customer_reviews.author: will in jax

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Meet Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this hopeful it would be fun for my 6 year old son. I watched the videos that showed the dune buggy effortlessly traversing grass and other terrain. That’s not so much the case for our expierience thus far. It slows drastically when it gets off paved surfaces. The battery life is not great either. If I had it to do over I would consider other ride on toys.
customer_reviews.author: MCR

customer_reviews.title: The absolute BEST toy I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: The absolute BEST toy I have ever purchased. This thing stays charged for HOURS and is rode 24/7 by all the kids on the block all the time. Ranging from age 4-13. Its just fast enough o get a thrill but slow enough o be safe. I wish they made a version just like this with more leg room. The only ones I have found are the drifters (won't go on grass like this one) and ones that go faster. I want it for our older kids but don't want anything any faster than this, LOVE THIS BUGGY!!!
customer_reviews.author: L.E.M Photography

customer_reviews.title: I have even ridden it and it is really fun (137lbs and went just fine)
customer_reviews.text: My (small) 7 year old LOVES this! I have even ridden it and it is really fun (137lbs and went just fine). We have not had it long enough to speak on durability or longevity, but so far, so good. It came assembled - though the thumb control was upside down. My husband was able to loosen it, turn it correctly and tighten it back up with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: C.Snave

customer_reviews.title: I’m pissed!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift delivered to my step daughter... this is how it arrived!!!!
customer_reviews.author: T Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect X-Mas surprise
customer_reviews.text: Took a gamble buying this used. It wasn't running, but after checking the wiring and fixing it it's perfect! Ordered a cheap charger and it runs great. My step son is 11 and quite tall and he still fits in it. All the kids in the neighborhood ages 4-12 fit in it and learn how to drive it very quickly. It runs for hours, i don't think it's died on the kids yet! The frame is good quality metal and the tires are nice and fatty. We we very surprised at the quality of this and the kids absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeena

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids are happy
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids eyes were so large when they saw the buggy the smiles on their faces were worth a million dollars. They asked us if it was really theirs and if so could they keep it at their house. I feel I made the right decision in buying this for them.
customer_reviews.author: Frank H Olio

customer_reviews.title: great fun!
customer_reviews.text: bought this for grandchildren to share when they come to visit...gets quite a bit of use for the days they are here and the battery seems to hold up for quite awhile...so much enjoyment for them, I bought a second one.. now they race each other...just as much fun for the 6 yr old as the 12 yr. old---it says it can hold up to 120lbs, and it does... just goes a little slower if more weight--runs on grass as well as pavement...very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: gerry cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Very easy! Literally take it out of the box and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very easy! Literally take it out of the box and plug it in and you are good to go. Delivery was very slow and kept getting delayed but don't know if that was UPS fault or not. My son is 8 and loves it but I don't think he will be able to play much longer with it - maybe till age 10ish.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Smith

customer_reviews.title: Your kid will love it
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son loves this buggy. We live in the country and he goes over some rough pasture in it. Battery lasts about 30-40 minutes. Takes a few hours to charge back up. I prob need to figure out how to get another battery pack and swap it out quickly when one gets drained so you wouldn’t have to wait hours to ride again. Overall it’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Shearer

customer_reviews.title: The best gift my kid ever received.
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive over buying this because of the cost, but I can say after 9 months of use that it was well worth it. My kid loved this on day one and nine months later it is still his favorite toy. It's fast enough to feel exciting, but not so fast that it makes me nervous. He uses it on grass, driveway and pavement and it does well on all three. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Def a buy!!
customer_reviews.text: A great step up from the plastic ride on toys. Goes twice as fast as my daughters power wheel ride on toys and now she doesn't want to ride anything else. Still goes slow enough to make me not worry. You can't change the battery as easily as the other ride on's I've had. I like to take the battery out of toys when I store them for the winter. I wish it had easier access so this could be done and charged outside of the vehicle, but that's just minor. Overall, this machine has power and pulls my 70lb child easily on grass.
customer_reviews.author: Coffeepot

customer_reviews.title: Easy to drive
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this! They are 4 and 6 years old. Both can drive it with ease. My 8 and 10 year old nephews love it too! My only issue is after I bought it the price went down over $200!!! We paid over $500 on Amazon then saw it on Amazon for $280. That made me feel sick!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kids love
customer_reviews.text: So far so good , read charging instructions and follow parents, kids use on pretty level ground , mostly packed bluestone road , some grass . Guessing average 45 min to hour ride time between charges . Do sit low to ground , so teach kids not to hit tree root/stumps or will damage steering rods, ask me how I know. ha
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant about getting a go cart for my five year old.. but this thing is very safe. No way it goes 9 mph, but I would say 5-6 mph tops which is great for my sons age. It does great on grass and even went in two inches of snow. Very impressed with this go cart and the quality. My son is tall for almost six, but he fits fine in this thing too. Weighs about 60 lbs and it moves great with him in it. I would def buy again
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Like the mobile but the battery seems to discharge quicker ...
customer_reviews.text: Like the mobile but the battery seems to discharge quicker than I think it should. Also seems small for my 5 year old who is pretty tall for her age. I wanted this to last until she could handle a gas powered dune buggy but I doubt that will be the case. Did not open box at Christmas but pleasantly found out that the mobile is ALREADY ASSEMBLED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Pace

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this when I was a kid!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gift for my 8yo son! He loves it! My only complaint with this particular version of the Razor collection is that this one is a bit slower than the other go-karts they sell. So, I need to tell my son that although his is slower, he can go on grass and dirt and the others can't. It is still plenty fast for him for now, but he doesn't like when his brother/sister pass him on their go-karts. Overall, my kids LOVE this! And I am so jealous - I wish I could be a kid again!
customer_reviews.author: bnett

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Works and my children love it! Battery lasts a long time and it’s fun taking it out for a spin. 5 year old has no trouble with it and neither does my 10 year old Lol! It’s very low to the ground so make sure to do it in a safe space. Cars can’t see the buggy and kids can’t see the cars.
customer_reviews.author: FunShopper

customer_reviews.title: ... year old for Christmas last year and it is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 7 year old for Christmas last year and it is amazing!!!! Rubber tires are great for traction and she rides it in the grass and on the asphalt. I'm 5'6" and 160 lbs. I ride it also with no problems at all. We are about to order our second one so that we can ride the neighborhood together! Love this thing!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 8 year old as her birthday preset. Her and her friends absolutely love it and have a blast driving it around. When the other kids come over they fight over who gets to drive it. My only complaint would be to have a taller flag. Preferable it was 6' so cars can easily see it driving.
customer_reviews.author: Jerssmith

customer_reviews.title: Fun Go-cart
customer_reviews.text: My 9 and 10 year-old boys love this. It's well built, sporty-looking, and has pneumatic tires for a softer ride. Not too crazy fast but still gives a fun ride. Batteries seem to last as long as any other Razor product--giving plenty of time for fun. This buggy has a bit higher ground clearance than the other Razor go-carts--although it's clearly for hard-surface riding, like pavement and concrete. It doesn't have enough power or grip for grass or sand.
customer_reviews.author: Derek White

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it. Parents happy with it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas but wanted my kid to use it while there wasn't any snow. Works on grass very well. Very happy with this purchase. Needs a better turning radius but it is workable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Batteries don’t last
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good buy though definitely not for an 8 year old. Our now 5 year old loves riding on it. Does great in grass and pavement it’s sturdy and low cg makes it unlikely to tip. Biggest complaint is battery life. It doesn’t have a smart charger and after only a year the batteries are shot. New batteries are 70 bucks. Hope they last!
customer_reviews.author: Katya

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work
customer_reviews.text: This thing is built solid and very sturdy. Good size, and HEAVY. It did not work when we got it. Never heard a reply from razors customer service, so we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: hf2272

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: These are worth every penny. My 4 year old boys love them and so do our older neighbors kids who are 8 and 9. Such a great ride on that will last my boys years.
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: A plesant surprise!
customer_reviews.text: After my 6 year old daughter power wheels had a motor go out after only a few months, and the cost to get a new part + shipping was $65 I decided to forget it and got her one of these. For around the same price the quality is worlds apart. It arrived fully assembled (a huge bonus) and the frame is metal. The battery is powerful and runs on grass/ dirt at 10 mph (ish) . She has run it everyday for a couple weeks now and I have been totally impressed with it. The battery provides ample power but only lasts 50-60 minutes of continuos use to this point. Considering a spare battery cuz we think it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best present ever!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best present we've bought our 8 year old daughter and she's had some nice ones. The only thing I don't like is you have to unscrew a bunch of screws like 16 or more to replace the battery. Made the spare batteries we bought a waste since it's not worth the trouble to swap then out. We have used it for over an hour at a time and it hasn't died, so that's not an issue yet. We had a 6 year old get on it that was real nervous, after 5 minutes, she was a pro. It was worth every dollar!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A Rohrer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the next thing I bought, after my son had a 2.5 and then 5mph power wheels since the age of two. He is five and handles it with ease. Should have at least two years experience at the 5mph power Wheels, in my opinion, if he or she is a toddler. Definitely need a helmut and more supervision due to 10-12 mph depending on the battery power but this thing is incredible. I wish I had one when I was his age. I bought it in the off season and was a lot cheaper than at Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Our son is in love with this gift. We have a long driveway with a turnaround so this is perfect at our home. It comes 95%assembled which we were very surprised and excited. The trigger in steering wheel needs to be adjusted for kids that are shorter or have shorter arms can easily push with their thumb. Could be moved to lower part of the steering wheel to make this easier. Doesn’t stop our son from getting it going! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shane & Brian Ledbetter-Dunn

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I must say I am very happy that I bought this for my son. I got this for 2014 Christmas and it still running strong. My son is 6 and fits him perfect. I just had to adjust the thumb throttle because it was installed upside down. But not a big deal very easy to adjust. the battery life last a while also he gets tired of ridding it before the battery runs out. HE loves it
customer_reviews.author: junior

customer_reviews.title: Perfect speed for a kid that age
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 year old grandaughter, as that is the age it was rated for. She is too old for the Barbie Jeep. She is having a blast. Perfect speed for a kid that age. I will have to follow up with another review after a year and comment on how it holds up to kid tearing up the neighborhood!! By the time she is 12 she will be ready for the adult dune buggy I will have to build her.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Bentwrench

customer_reviews.title: looks and feels sturdy, for the price is an excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: This product is truly what they claim it to be, it comes fully assembled, looks and feels sturdy, for the price is an excellent buy. I got a couple of weeks ago for my nephew and he loved it and is riding it all the time.. One other important thing that impressed me was the customer service, they responded to my email and questions I had right away and extremely accommodating, I give their customer service a 5+ out five ! !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Study
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little car. It's perfect for my 6& 8 yo boys. I do wish it jad reverse because they have have to lift it but still fun. Debating on getting a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McDonald

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Its winter so thebarentnout too long on it, but the batteeylife seems slightly better than expected. My 4 year old often steals it from my 8&9 yearold that it was intended for, however, shenloves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: good product.
customer_reviews.text: all in all ints a good product... needs a few adjustments... steering wheel positioning is awkward, the seat doesn't adjust... (with some thoughtful engineering i anchored the seat closer for my 5 year old to be able to drive it) happy with the purchase my boy is having lots of fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anret

customer_reviews.title: Great for our 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome for our 8 year old. It runs like a champ offroad too. It is super stable so seems pretty safe too. Yay Razor!
customer_reviews.author: happimomma

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson can go and do things that he has not been able to do. He was born with spina bifida, and he cannot walk without his braces. With the dune buggy he can play tag with the other kids, and go many places that he couldn't before. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Karlene Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Great FUN!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 5 1/2 year old grandson, who has had expierience driving some motorized things (like his tractor), but this was GREAT we could hardly get him off it. They live on a big piece if property with a huge driveway so he was able to take off and ride all around. We'd even catch him sneaking out fo r"one more ride". "Greatest gift he's ever gotten".
customer_reviews.author: Long time Customer Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great starter buggy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter buggy for a kid. It has enough power and speed for them to have a blast but isn't too powerful, so they can learn to control it. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: KingVC

customer_reviews.title: Nice but smal
customer_reviews.text: Great little go kart but the placement of the button used for the gas is in a horrible place. Hard to use comfortably. And it Is a little small for the age and weight range.
customer_reviews.author: karen elliott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his Go Kart. Battery last long enough for his attention span.
customer_reviews.author: pattyf

customer_reviews.title: Great cart for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great Razor product. I bought 2, one for my 5 and 8 year olds. Good alternative until you’re ready for gas-operated carts. Drive time for continuous riding is about 75 minutes fully charged. The speed is about 8.5mph for my 5 year old, and slightly slower for my 8 year old because she weighs more. Even my wife can ride, and she 5’8” about 128 lbs. Overall, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kcampbell10

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed with this thing. I got it for my 7 year old son for Christmas and it’s slow. I was expecting this thing to really move. After 5 minutes of riding he is already asking if it will go faster. For the money I’m sorry I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had ours for about 3yrs now and our kids still ride it daily. Batteries still god charge fine, the only maintenance we’ve had to do is air up the tires once. Dads out there: not recommending anyone exceed the weight limit but I happen to know a 41yr old who hops on it from time to time with no issues other than it drains the battery a little quicker
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I like closeness to ground and that it has seat belt, speed is as promise 9 to 10 mph.
customer_reviews.author: terry sinkfield

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT WORKS GREAT! My 8 rides this daily
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT WORKS GREAT! My 8 rides this daily. It has a nice charge and will run for about 6 hours on a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: JUSTIN

customer_reviews.title: "Best Christmas ever" -My Son
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 7 year old boy for Christmas this year. I was worried about assembly but it was fully assembled out of the box. Only think to do it drop in the Ramon flag. Charged it up a few days before Christmas and it was ready to go. He was out in the back yard tearing it up. Battery lasts WAY longer then I thought it would. So far this has been a great purchase. Totally recommend for anyone looking for a more fun alernative to boring old wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Zach D

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality build. Battery lasts 40 minutes as advertised. Lots of fun for my 9 year old.
customer_reviews.author: chaz

customer_reviews.title: Great Dune Buggy by razor — THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This is heaven for my grandchildren!. I wished I'd have had one of this carts when I was a child. Pure joy! Very well thought out and sturdy enough for the small treatment of youngsters. GREAT PURCHASE!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Hernan Benavides

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this was a hit on Christmas morning! We had it charged and ready to go and it was worm enough to ride for hours. It traversed our back yard extremely well and the battery life was exceptional. I highly recommend this and expect to get tons of use out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Karli

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Great fun and Great Product. Kids ride on yard and groomed trails.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one charge
customer_reviews.text: Lasted one charge. I wrote them to get help and I am still waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Bozo

customer_reviews.title: 9) and they love them. They go safe fast enough over grass ...
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but worth it. Bought 3 for my grand kids (5,8,9) and they love them. They go safe fast enough over grass and gravel and the batts last long enough.
customer_reviews.author: DClos

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 7 yr old for his birthday runs great all neighborhood kids ride
customer_reviews.author: Adam Davis

customer_reviews.title: My son has amazing time with this buggy car
customer_reviews.text: My son love it, he is 7 years old, but the height of a 5 year old kid, he has some phisical limitation due his mild CP, but he does pretty well. I would say I would buy it for a kiddo from 5 years old to 8 or maybe 9, but after that it can bored, do pretty well on grass and faster on concrete, hold battery for a long time period.
customer_reviews.author: DANA

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Great toy!! My 5yr and 8yr old love it. They drive in the desert, grass and road. Real bumpy if going off road. Wish it had reverse but I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Solid battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Battery has been holding a charge pretty good. It moves pretty good with a 45 lbs kid on it, but not so fast that he’s out of control. He can even take it off road on some slight inclines in the grass.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: Great speed. I think depending on the weight it’s ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! Great speed. I think depending on the weight it’s holding depends on the battery consumption. Downside to this is it doesn’t have an adjustable seat for shorter kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 3 year old ( almost 4 ) son because his older cousin has one. Since he still is too young to judge safety with speed and quick response, we take him to a large open field/park so he can drive till his little heart is content! He really enjoys it and looks forward to going. Im very happy with our purchase and glad he won't be outgrowing it anytime soon. The charge last a good amount of time which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Love2Shop

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 and so far the kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Fun ride!
customer_reviews.text: My child absolutely loves this Go Cart! It is fast and very fun! They only down side is that it doesn’t have a reverse.
customer_reviews.author: Hana

customer_reviews.title: Still loving it, a year later!
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Whenever my nephews come to visit my son, it's the only thing they want to do! I bought it over a year ago. Everything, including battery still working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine Martinez

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old loves it! It was the next ...
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old loves it! It was the next step up from his powerwheels jeep. More agile and goes faster. Be sure they wear a helmet!
customer_reviews.author: E & M Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Try this on your grandson!
customer_reviews.text: I used this go-kart as a basis for adding to it. Our grandson now has headlights, brake lights and a very loud AOOGAH horn and the beauty is that it goes 8 MPH. Well constructed and easy to add the additional battery and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley I Billington

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for our 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Our kid is loving this go kart - Lots of fun. Easy to charge. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: CLW

customer_reviews.title: Great Kart for 8 - 12 year olds
customer_reviews.text: Great electric Go-kart for an 8-12 year old. Was quite surprised at how well it handled grass with the relatively small wheels and also impressed with the ride time, where my 10 year old got sore hands and butt after 30 mins, before the battery ran out. Would highly recommend. Also great that it pretty much comes fully assembled, with only some safety checks and a flag to install.
customer_reviews.author: P. Malaise

customer_reviews.title: Best toy Razor has made
customer_reviews.text: Got my son this for Xmas, the second all the kids saw him riding it they put their toys down and wanted to play with his dune buggy, this thing can take a beating. It's been ridden almost everyday since Xmas. Best gift yet
customer_reviews.author: jennifer lafuente

customer_reviews.title: Love it. My son rides this all the time ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My son rides this all the time and its super easy to use. He is 5 and has no problem doing it on his own!! I even ride with him at times! Battery seems to last for good amount of time. He will use this for years I am sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 1/2 year old son loves this dune buggy! It arrived fully assembled, just needed to be charged over night. It's been working really well, easy to drive and tons of fun! Love the flag and seatbelt for safety. Consider ordering a helmet if you don't have one.
customer_reviews.author: maelal

customer_reviews.title: Best Razor around with lots of fun time!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these razors in November of 2014 for my twin grandsons. They absolutely LOVE them. They arrived on time and completely put together. One of the boxes was totally destroyed but the Razor wasn't damaged. They have had so much fun with their own Razor. I couldn't buy just one and have them fight over it so I had to purchase two and never regretted it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Gibson

customer_reviews.title: needs big tires on the rear
customer_reviews.text: needs big tires on the rear it doesn't go in small rock
customer_reviews.author: larry e paylor jr

customer_reviews.title: YOU GOTTA GET ONE OF THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for my 9 year old son! He uses it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Fowler

customer_reviews.title: A great buy
customer_reviews.text: My son love this we live in upstate ny and he rides it in the snow. I can Not wait for summer so that way we can take it out on the trails and things like that this is a great buy for any kid who loves motors and wants to be on the move.
customer_reviews.author: Iesa

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves zooming around the culdesac in this! It can drive on grass and has a great amount of speed for a child.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Soooo FUN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It came out of the box ready to go...I mean literally--our kids jumped on it and went and have been going ever since. It is one of the best ride on toys we have ever gotten.(power wheels, gas 4 wheelers, etc.) From our 8 year old girl to our 6 year old boy (and the little girls love to ride sitting behind them 3 and 2 years old) and their 42 year old mom--we all love to ride it. Fairly good price compared to other go carts I looked at. It has enough power to be fun but not too much where it severly ruts the yard.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pickering

customer_reviews.title: fun!
customer_reviews.text: This dune buggy is great! My seven and five year olds love it. Sturdy construction. However, you might not want to let your five year old try to drive it full speed under your parked mini van in the driveway. Broke the throttle right off after only having it a few weeks. Ah well, had to call Razor for a replacement part. So that's why it's for eight year olds. I even get on it from time to time and zoom around. I would definitely reccomend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Charity T

customer_reviews.title: This is a super fun toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a super fun toy. We have had it one day and the kids all took turns having a great time on it. Even cramming two kids on it and it was still going. It appears very durable and well made
customer_reviews.author: Working Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good First for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Not too fast for my 8 year old, but quick enough to learn. Wish had a helmet recommendation with it.
customer_reviews.author: bvpd71

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: We live in the Texas Hill Country and needed a safe and tough riding toy for our 4 year old. Yes, I said 4. My son was able to easily drive this because of the hand controls and it goes all over our property, no matter what surface it is on. Obviously the ride is smoother on asphalt, but our rocky ranch roads do not stop this thing. The super low profile makes this thing very safe. EVERY child that uses it.. LOVES IT and our neighbors bought one too!. I highly recommend this thing. Charge lasts a good amount of time. Enough for 10 kids to ride around all evening.
customer_reviews.author: LCKatt

customer_reviews.title: we are the best parents ever
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow have we had fun with this! Goes great on pasture, grass and pavement. easy to charge. Easy to operate. cons: no reverse, have to bring in if it freezes as battery can't freeze.
customer_reviews.author: OKOK

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: All of my kids really enjoy this. It runs through our bumpy/hilly yard without issue. The only thing I wish it had is a reverse for when the kids inevitably run into things
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is so awesome can't even begin to tell you
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome can't even begin to tell you. Our three year old is like the size of 5 year old and has mastered this driving it every where.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Clifford

customer_reviews.title: George
customer_reviews.text: The Dune Buggy was delivered on the date promised. It was completely assembled and fully charged and ready to go right out of the box. The Dune Buggy is very well made. The tires are smooth and don't have any tread on them. This is probably done to decrease road friction making them roll easier but I don't think they are going to last very long. It is also chain driven which is a little noisy but much easier and cheaper to repair than a direct drive unit. All in all my grandson loves it and has a blast driving it around the neiborhood. Amazon had the best price and free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: George H. Angelo Jr.

product_meta.title: Razor Dune Buggy
product_meta.description:
The Razor Dune Buggy provides the ultimate in electric powered off-road capabilities. Powerful speeds up to 9mph and can carry up to 120lbs ! The Dune Buggy's specially designed reduction drive is perfect for lower torque climbing and off-roading. 8" knobby tires and big bucket seat allow for a smooth comfortable ride. Ages 8+. NOTE: Please refer User manual Page no 3 on how to charge the battery.This vintage-cool ride will give older kids and teens plenty of buggy thrills. Eight-inch knobby pneumatic tires and terrain following rear suspension come together for a smooth ride

AMAZON.COM
Want to give your child a little off-road entertainment? Turn to the Razor dune buggy, the ultimate in electric-powered backcountry cruising. Outfitted with a powerful 350-watt motor designed to reach speeds of up to 10 miles per hour, the buggy is fast enough for serious fun, but slow enough that it won't compromise your child's safety. Parents will also appreciate the side roll cage, which creates a barrier between the rider and the outside, and the padded bucket seat, which includes a seatbelt for added security. And thanks to the buggy's specially designed reduction drive, the vehicle is capable of both lower torque climbing and high torque gearing. Perhaps the coolest feature, however, is the fully electric design, which is not only easy to charge, but requires no fuel at all, runs quietly, and produces no emissions. 

Other details include eight-inch knobby pneumatic tires, an active rear suspension, a durable tubular steel frame with diamond-plate floorboards, hand throttle and brake controls, a rear disc brake, and a safety flag. Ideal for difficult tracks and terrain, the buggy supports up to 120 pounds of weight and is suitable for ages 8 and older.

Key Features:

 * For ages 8+ 
 * 120-pound weight limit 
 * Can reach speeds of up to 10 miles per hour 
 * 350 watt motor 
 * 8 knobby pneumatic tires 
 * Bucket seats with seatbelt 
 * Powder coated finish on tubular steel frame 
 * Protective padding 
 * Diamond plate floorboards 
 * Hand throttle and brake controls 
 * Rear disc brake 
 * Safety flag 
 * Vertical storage
feature_bullets: Compact kids dune buggy with powerful 350-watt electric motor. Reaches speeds of up to 9 mph.
Assembled Dimensions: 41 inch x 26.5 inch x 17.5 inch
8-inch knobby pneumatic tires. Hand throttle and brake controls.
Supports up to 120 pounds driver weight. For ages 8 and older.
Requires no fuel to run. Battery life up to 40 mins.
Durable tubular steel frame. Padded bucket seat with seatbelt.
